'''12w30b''' is the sixteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.3.1]], released on July 23, 2012<ref>{{link|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20120726015751/https://www.mojang.com/2012/07/mincraft-snapshot-12w30a/|title=Minecraft Snapshot 12w30b|website=mojang.com}}</ref>, and fixes some of the bugs and crashes in the [[12w30a]] snapshot.

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed a <code>null pointer exception</code>.
* Fixed being unable to right-click on [[block]]s.
* Fixed [[chest]]s stacked on top of other chests not opening.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This version's article is incorrectly rotuled as "12w30a" in the URL. It also has a misspelling "mincraft".
